item.title: Opting out of haveibeenpwned
item.description: Data breaches are a concern for anyone trying to live a life of relative privacy. Last month, PowerSchool informed its customers that hackers stole data of 62 million students. This may not have impacted you, but unless you have been practicing Extreme Privacy techniques for decades, you likely have been impacted by a data breach in the past.
